name: guillerming/guacamole
description: Modern php strict typed non-opinionated framework

scripts.format: git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=ACM | grep '\.php$' | xargs -r -I{} sh -c 'PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --allow-risky=yes --config=.php-cs-fixer.dist.php "{}"'
scripts.lint: git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=ACM | grep '\.php$' | xargs -r vendor/bin/phpstan analyse --level=max
